p: Citrus samples were produced by a local, individual producer (Aldo Fiorentini) of the Massa province. The flavoured extra-virgin olive oils and the control (not flavoured) were produced from Frantoio, Moraiolo, and Leccino olive varieties provided by a private company located in Tuscany (San Miniato, Pisa, Italy) during the 2017/2018 crop season ( Table 8).
